title: New Client Hextec Crafting bug?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: umm..so i have absolutely nothing in my hextec crafting for some reason, is this normal?  i had so much stuff and its not there anymore..this happen to anybody else? is this normal? anybody know what i can do? :(

replies.body: it is a alpha/beta client check on the normal client and see if its still there if it isnt then i would recommend rito support i guess...
i hope all my stuff comes back soon :c
mine is fine. However it did bug out when i traded in level 6 mastery tokens so i had to relog.
